stellacrtumMatchInfo: If the card [Stellactrum Match] is on full the stage's requirments use protocores with the main stat as [DMG Boost to Weakened] or [Oath Recovery Boost], otherwise [CRIT DMG], [CRIT Rate]  and [Expedited Energy Boost].
introSolar: Sometimes 5★ companions want slightly different build. For solar pairs β protocore might change depending on the Ranks your have.
chooseProtocores: choose protocores based on your needs

substatsChoice.basic: For substats priorities protocores with ATK, ATK Bonus, CRIT Rate, CRIT DMG, DMG Boost to Weakened

solar.abysswalker: ATK, ATK Bonus, CRIT Rate, CRIT DMG, DMG Boost to Weakened
solar.god_of_the_tides: HP, HP Bonus, CRIT Rate, CRIT DMG, DMG Boost to Weakened
solar.lemurian_sea_god: DEF, DEF Bonus, CRIT Rate, CRIT DMG, DMG Boost to Weakened

solarCardsInfo: Solar cards use [α] and [β] protocores. [α] has a fixed main HP stat while [β]'s main stat derives.
lunarCardsInfo: Lunar cards use [γ] and [δ] protocores. [γ] has a fixed main ATK stat while [δ]'s main stat derives.
critBuildsInfo: For crit builds don't forget to check your [CRIT Rate] before entering the stage. For comfortable ratio aim for 60-80% [CRIT Rate]. Remember your [CRIT DMG] doesn't matter if you do not utilize it.
OathInfo: Usually your companion will be able to use [Ardent Oath] once during the battle. To use it twice use [Oath Recovery Boost] for β protocore.
energyInfo: [Active Skill] and [Resonance Skill] require special energy ◆, to regenerate it faster use [Expedited Energy Boost] for β protocore.
